Uses of Class
edu.stanford.pigir.arcspread.POSTagger

  • Packages that use POSTagger 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.pigir.arcspread  

    • Uses of POSTagger in edu.stanford.pigir.arcspread

      Methods in edu.stanford.pigir.arcspread that return POSTagger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      POSTagger POSTagger.tag()
      All text will be POS-tagged with the simplified POS tags.
      POSTagger POSTagger.tag(String htmlTags)
      Only text within provided HTML tags will be POS-tagged, with simplified POS tag set.
      POSTagger POSTagger.tag(String htmlTags, boolean simplifiedPOSTags)
      Only text within provided HTML tags will be POS-tagged.
      POSTagger POSTagger.tag(String htmlTags, boolean simplifiedPOSTags, String posTags)
      Full control over all three behaviors.
